title: If BTS is better and has more experience, why does Blackpink beat some of their records and have more fans? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ok. LET ME GET SOME FACTS STRAIGHT. Fans. Blackpink DO NOT have more fans than BTS. First of all, they’re having trouble completely selling out concerts in America. Meanwhile, BTS sell out STADIUM concerts in matter of minutes after it starts to sell. Although Blackpink are extremely popular right now, it doesn’t mean they have more fans than BTS. Awards. Blackpink has not won nearly as many awards as BTS have. How many awards in America has Blackpink won? And recently, BTS won both Top Duo/Group and Top Social Artist in the BBMAS. BTS also got nominated for the Grammys. Although fans for other artists are teasing us, saying we didn’t win, did your favorites even get a nomination? No? ok. (maybe some did) Well tease us after you GET a nomination. And Daesangs. Do you know how many Daesangs BP has won compared to BTS? Firstly, BTS has won over 28 awards in 2018 ITSELF. I don’t think BP has gotten that many in their more than 2 years. If they did, congrats, I guess? BTS has the most Daesangs won in 1 year. In the year 2018, they won 12 Daesangs. Has BP won that in over 2 years? No? Exactly. And records? What records did they break? DDU-DU-DDU-DU? Of course, I’ll admit. Blinks are good streamers, and DDU-DU-DDU-DU is ahead of DNA in views. Blinks have at least 20 songs less than ARMYs to stream. They have, what, 9–10 MVs? Yes, for no albums, and all mini albums, 9–10 MVs is pretty good, but that’s not really the point. Meanwhile BTS has 30+. Try streaming all that and still managing to be one of the most viewed groups. And BTS has broke the 24 hour record with Boy With Luv. Not just Kpop, but in YT history. And they’re also the fastest to reach 10M, 50M, 100M, and 150M. Blackpink HASN’T BROKEN THAT YET. Of course, they broke the 200M record. And BTS did that even though YT deleted over 20M views, and froze the views half the time. I’m not saying YT didn’t freeze KTL views, but they didn’t delete any views. (Anyhow congrats to BP for being the first kpop group to get to 1B with 4D) Charting. Has BP ever gotten a #1 on the Top Artists Billboard? BTS has. And just recently. And the Melon chart. Boy With Luv is ahead of Kill This Love. Social Artist? BTS has been #1 for over 120 weeks. BTS is now the second band after the beatles to have three no. 1 on the Billboard, after the Beatles. Has BP done that? Sorry, I don’t hate BP. Just stating facts. I’m not saying Blackpink hasn’t worked hard, in fact, I don’t really have a place to stand in the Jennie “lazy” controversy, because honestly, she could actually be sick or tired, more so than other members. But if she isn’t, that’s another debate. I’m not trying to get people to hate Blackpink, I’m just telling, okay, maybe rambling to this person and others why Blackpink has not beaten a lot of their records, and have more fans. Also, I’m sorry if I was rude or offensive or biased. I’m an ex-blink so that does stuff- people have their own opinions and i don’t care if you disagree with mine EDIT: uhm so months have passed and im kind of a blink now? and my bias is jisoo. to the blinks out there if anyone is still reading this, do you suggest i delete this? or should i keep it up and just never write answers which provokes fanwars again/dragging groups

This is a Troll question if I ever read one and should be immediately removed from Quora. Let’s deal with the last question first. BP has more fans? If this s true then why is it BP has trouble selling out their concerts in America, while BTS sells out their STADIUM concerts in a matter of minutes after they were announced. Now let’s move to awards, has BP won any awards in America? Just last night BTS set another first by being the first ASIAN artist to win the DUO/Group Award from the BBMA’s, along with winning their third Social Artist of the year award. Has BP ever come close to doing anything close to this? As for the records. You don’t mention what records BP supposedly beat of BTS, but I will assume you mean those on YouTube. Problem is, these records were taken back by BTS just last week. Even though the people at YouTube removed 25 million views from BTS, they still beat the record to fastest to 100 million views, with a one day total of 74.6 million views, a record in itself that most likely won’t be broken anytime time soon. What’s interesting about this is that YouTube, took away 25 million views from BTS, but added nearly 7 million views to BlackPink so they could get their record. YouTube constantly says it is common practice for them to remove views from MV’s during high streaming times, claiming that many of those views are bots, but when you look at their examples, you see that only one group has an extremely high count of views being removed, and in each case, that is BTS. Now, are you telling me that EXO fans are lazy? Are you telling me that BlackPink fans are lazy? Are you telling me that all other fandoms are lazy? Of course they aren’t, they all work hard, just as hard as the ARMY does when BTS releases new MV’s. So, sorry to bust your bubble troll bait, BTS has the records, the Awards, and the most fans. I’m not dissing on your favorite BlackPink, just telling you like it is. If it’s hard to accept, I’m sorry, but it is what it is. Have a good day!
